head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SILBER, PAULINE R

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SILBER, PAULINE R

block.p: SILBER--Pauline R, ''Nafla Ateret Rosheinu'' Most devoted wife of the late Joseph F. Beloved mother of William L, Joy, and Jinny Pinsky. Loving mother-in-law of Lillian Silber and Jerry Pinsky. Adoring and adored grandmother and great-grandmother. She leaves a tremendous void and will be sorely missed. Shiva begins after Pesach.

SILBER--Pauline R, ''Nafla Ateret Rosheinu'' Most devoted wife of the late Joseph F. Beloved mother of William L, Joy, and Jinny Pinsky. Loving mother-in-law of Lillian Silber and Jerry Pinsky. Adoring and adored grandmother and great-grandmother. She leaves a tremendous void and will be sorely missed. Shiva begins after Pesach.
